靕字的基本解释

靕
zhèng
古同“正”，品行纯正，不染邪曲。

靕字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhēn］
行为端正，不染邪曲。

靕字的康熙字典解释

【戌集中】【青字部】　靕； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页1381第27
【篇海】之人切，音眞。太上作亳州老君?，張道忠添註：从一从止从主从月。正者，眞也，一倂止爲正。主者，注也，注月爲青。青者，東方之色也，五方之首也，四正之初也。正者，眞也。人能行眞正，不染邪曲者，爲仙之基本也。

靕字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
靕字的起名意思

行为端正，不染邪曲。

Di
Basic explanation of words
Di
zhèng
Gu Tong is "righteous", with pure character and no evil tunes.
Di
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhēn］
Behave properly and don't get evil music.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【戌集】【青字部】　靕; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 1381 Page 27
[Pianhai] The person cuts, the sound is stubborn. Taishang is the old emperor of Bozhou? Zhang Daozhong added a note: From one to the end, from the master to the month. The positive is positive. The master, note also, note that the month is green. The green person is the color of the East, the head of the five directions, and the beginning of the Sizheng. The positive is also. People who can act righteously and do not dye evil songs are the foundation of immortals.
